text: @mikegalsworthy Reading most of the tweets I am saddened to see people accepting limitations, population is huge hence it cannot be achieved. The outcome from not being proactive is catastrophic & it is not really NZ vs UK but lack of a clear direction with many countries in handling of covid19

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
